title: Creative Ways To Cultivate What Matters - with Lara Casey
description: As we head into the holidays and look ahead to the New Year, we’re hearing a lot about goals and resolutions, aren’t we? It can all be a little overwhelming. So, in this episode, we’re diving into creative ways to not only set goals but ACTUALLY ACHIEVE them with discipline and a healthy dose of grace — because we’re only human, right? Jordan brought Lara Casey, author and the creator of Powersheets™️, to give you the best tips and tools to setting meaningful goals so that you can cultivate what matters. Tune into learn from two master goal-getters, and find out just how little by little can add up to big wins for you in 2020.
author: matt@jordanleedooley.com (Jordan Lee Dooley)
